publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4840 Tommy Sheridan: Congratulations to Hugo Chavez—That the Parliament congratulates Hugo Chavez, democratically elected president of the Bolivarian Socialist Republic of Venezuela, on his address to the United Nations in New York, where he described George Bush as a "devil" in international terms and the greatest threat to peace and security across the planet; condemns the plans expressed by the United States of America to undemocratically undermine the Chavez government in Venezuela, and applauds the Venezuelan Government’s commitment to anti-poverty and democratic policies and to world peace.
